English[edit]

English Wikipedia has an article on:
Post
Wikipedia

Proper noun[edit]

Post

  1. A surname​.
  2. A village in Iran
  3. An unincorporated community in Oregon
  4. A city in and the county seat of Garza County, Texas.

Anagrams[edit]

  • OTPs, POTS, PTOs, Spot, TPOs, opts, pots, spot, stop, tops

Dutch[edit]

Proper noun[edit]

Post

  1. A surname​.

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Italian posta.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /pɔst/
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Post f (genitive Post, no plural)

  1. (method of sending mail or mail sent by this method) post
  2. post office

Synonyms[edit]

  • (post office): Postamt

Derived terms[edit]

  • Postkutsche

Related terms[edit]

  • Postleitzahl f
